title: Share of economic sectors in the GDP in Croatia 2018
summary: In 2018 , services contributed the most to france 's gross domestic product ( gdp ) , with a share of just over 70 percent . Having an economy based on the services sector is a widely recognized marker of an advanced economy . What are the attractions in the services sector ? france 's economy was about 2.7 trillion U.S. dollars , and its gdp is projected to increase through 2024 .
gold: This statistic shows the share of economic sectors in the gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Croatia from 2008 to 2018 . In 2018 , the share of agriculture in Croatia 's gross domestic product was 2.85 percent , industry contributed approximately 20.35 percent and the services sector contributed about 59.01 percent .
